name: Pinocchio's Puzzle
overview: Remember the puppet whose nose grew? Remember the values taught by the story? Friendship, cunning and tenderness... Will you reach the end of the story of Pinocchio through a series of puzzles? Based on the story by Carlo Collodi, Pinocchio's Puzzle is a game in which you must solve the different, progressively more difficult puzzles as you advance in the plot. Aside from developing sensory skills and hand-eye coordination, it adds the values of an endearing and mythical story told puzzle by puzzle. Features • Enjoy with 4 friends or family members playing at once. • Puzzles progressively more difficult. • Helps develop sensory skills. • Fabulous, beautiful illustrations and orchestral music
